id: UX/UI Design Project Brief - Notion Template
name: UX/UI Design Project Brief - Notion Template
description: Are you needing a professional and experienced UX/UI designer for your project? Look no further than this UX/UI Design Project Brief Notion template! In the Overview section, you can provide background information about yourself as the designer, highlighting your qualifications and expertise in the field. Additionally, in the "Why me" section, you explain what sets you apart from other designers and how you can bring value to a client's project.Under Services, you outline the specific design ser
features: Under Services, you outline the specific design services you offer, ensuring that all client's needs are met in one convenient location.; Finally, the Terms and Conditions section outlines important criteria regarding your working style to ensure that you have a smooth and productive collaboration.; With my Notion template, you can feel confident that your UX/UI design project is in good hands. Contact the client today to get started!
